comments: MoutValid aims to accelerate Web accessibility reporting on mutiple pages to save time and effort by scanning a large volume of site pages and discover compliance issues quickly, provide remediations on accessibility issue and if needed manual fixes that can be applied.
features: MoutValid is a software used to deliver fast, detailed and accurate Web accessibility audit status report on multiple Web pages of a website and  applications against WCAG compliance. It scans and checks page elements, provide tests results and observations that include remediations on accessibility issues found and suggestions for manual checks.
title: MoutValid
